title: Feature Request: binding for warp-ctc (Connectionist Temporal Classification loss)
body_html: The Connectionist Temporal Classification (CTC) loss is very useful for automatic speech recognition. Baidu has implemented it and provided the binding for tensorflow and torch (see warp-ctc). It would be very helpful if pytorch would have also the binding for warp-ctc.
body_text: The Connectionist Temporal Classification (CTC) loss is very useful for automatic speech recognition. Baidu has implemented it and provided the binding for  tensorflow and torch (see warp-ctc). It would be very helpful if pytorch would have also the binding for warp-ctc.
body: The Connectionist Temporal Classification (CTC) loss is very useful for automatic speech recognition. Baidu has implemented it and provided the binding for  tensorflow and torch (see [warp-ctc](https://github.com/baidu-research/warp-ctc)). It would be very helpful if pytorch would have also the binding for warp-ctc.
